name: CubeVibe

overview:
CubeVibe helps companies improve performance with on-demand employee engagement software.

Specifically, CubeVibe delivers on-demand tools to help managers hold effective meetings, set individual and team goals, track progress with simple metrics, and share real-time, 360Â° feedback.

Further, as our clients use these tools to improve performance, they get a crystal clear view of engagement across the entire organization from data captured automatically by CubeVibe. We can measure engagement in real-time by how employees are feeling, performing, and contributing.
